ai-anya-e0105n30:42_1: Hence it is said: “Give Discourses on the Sīhahanukas, look at this Great Sīhadow, the Ancient Lion, the Chabyāḷa, and Disciples, the Khujjasobha, Sīhaka, the daughters of old age, the old ages, and deathless.”
